name: Farm'n'gun
description:
Farm'n'Gun

"Farm'n'Gun" is a survival-shooter game which mixes shooting mechanics with farming ones, so the player will have to grow different kinds of ammo to defeat the crows and endure as many rounds as he can.

This game was originally developed for the Ludum Dare 41, but I did not participate in the first stage of it. Months later we decided to improve it and added some new elements which made the game more entertaining.

The game was developed by Blue Acentor.
